price: Farao kaa sε: “Nokorε sε mo somafoͻ no a yεsomaa no mo hͻ no abͻ dam paa “.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla inna rasūlakumu alladhī ur'sila ilaykum lamajnūnun
